|brand = BeagleBoard |model = BeagleBone |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = Black Wireless |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = N300 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = single-board computer,wireless embedded board |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = Z64-WL18SBMOD |icid = 4511-WL18SBMOD |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Octavo Systems;OSD3358; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A8 |cpu1spd = 1.0 GHz <!-- undocumented --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = eMMC |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Kingston;EMMC04G-M627; |flash1size = 4 GiB |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR3 |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 512 |ram1chip = Octavo Systems;OSD3358;On chip; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_none = true |oui = 80:30:DC
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;2018.09;; |stockos = Linux;4.14.71;Debian 9;
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0, USB 2.0 (OTG), |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 2 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 1 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner = 2.1 |pwr_barrel_len = 9.5 |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 6-pin header,, populated,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200 8N1) |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Bluetooth 4.1 BLE, Micro SD Card slot, HDMI, RTC, SPI, I2C, CAN, GPIO |addchip = 32k-bit EEPROM;Microchip;24LC32AT;;1;,,, 4-Channel ESD Solution for USB;TI;TPD4S012;;2;,,, ESD Protection Diode for HDMI;NXP;IP4283CZ10;;2;,,, Low-Power 3D HDMI Transmitter;NXP;TDA19988BHN;;1;,,, Current-Limited, Power-Distribution Switch;TI;TPS2051;;1;,,, Single Positive Edge-Triggered D-Type Flip-Flop;TI;SN74AUC1G74;;1;,,, 8-Bit Bidirectional Level-Shifting Voltage Translator;TI;TXS0108E;;2;,,, Dual Buffer and Driver With 3-StateOutput;TI;SN74LVC2G241;;1;,,, Single Buffer Driver w/Open-Drain Output;TI;SN74LVC1G07;;1;,,, 600mA Low Dropout Regulator;Diodes Inc;AP2112K;;1;,,, Single Inverter Buffer Driver;TI;SN74LVC1G06;;1;,,, Adjustable Shunt Regulator;TI;TLVH433ID;;1;,,, 1.5A Low Dropout Regulator;TI;TL1963A;;1; |802dot11_protocols = bgn
|defaulip = 192.168.8.1 |defaultlogin = debian |defaultpass = temppwd |defaultssid = BeagleBone-XXXX, |defaultssid_regex = ^BeagleBone-[A-F0-9]{4}$, |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = Arch Linux (Arm),
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 09/2016 |estprice = 69 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = 9SIAMATA8J0391 |asin = B076LL6P77 |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = <!-- Country device was manufactured in -->
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = Texas Instruments WL18MODGB |rad1modif = SDIO |rad1chip1 = Texas Instruments;WL1835MOD; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== {{See also|BeagleBoard|List of Single-board computers}}
===Specifications=== *CPU: ''[[Octavo Systems]]'' [https://octavosystems.com/octavo_products/osd335x/ OSD3358] (ARM Cortex-A8) SiP :Processor: [[TI]] ''Sitara'' AM3358 @1GHz (ARM Cortex-A8) :FPU: NEON floating-point accelerator (ARM Cortex-M3) :PRU: 2× 32-bit @200MHz programmable real-time units *RAM: 512MB (DDR3), Flash: 4GB (8-bit eMMC) on-board *PMIC: [[Texas Instruments]] TPS65217C, [[TI]] TL5209 (LDO) *1x USB 2.0 Host, Programmed with Debian Linux
The board can be powered by 3 different methods: *5V/1A power supply plugged into the connector *USB Female Micro-B *Expansion connectors
==Links of Interest== *[https://www.elinux.org/Beagleboard:BeagleBoneBlackWireless ''BeagleBone Black Wireless'' on '''eLinux''' Wiki]
===Rewiews=== *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2016/09/27/beaglebone-black-wireless-board-gets-wifi-and-bluetooth-4-1-le-drops-ethernet/ ''BeagleBone Black Wireless Board Gets WiFi and Bluetooth 4.1 LE'' on '''CNX|Software''' ] *[http://linuxgizmos.com/beaglebone-black-wireless-hacker-sbc-taps-octavo-sip/ ''BeagleBone Black Wireless SBC taps Octavo SiP, has open design'' on '''LinuxGizmos''' ]
